short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Puts a game over the youtube advertisement

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Instead of watching a soul-sucking ad, learn something new on top of a relaxing blue background. 

Block Youtube Ads:
- Blocks the ad and turns off the audio
- Replaces with a fun-fact for the duration
- Auto skips when the ad is done (5 seconds)
